 Most of this probably had to do with being used to watching other Shinsengumi related shows which were a bit more fast paced. 


...could you possibly recommend any of those shows? I know there's supposed to be a lot of anime and such that relates to them.

Oh, and I don't agree with the reviewer... I thought the show started out all right, got rather boring at times in the middle (then again, that may be because I don't care for the Maro/fake Okita storyline at all, I think it had potential but they did very little useful with it) and really picked up from #18 onwards.
